summary.span: 這個類別會儲存具型別陣列的元素型別，但這個類別不會儲存資料。

span.span: This class stores the element type of a typed array, but this class does not store data.

summary.span: 叫用元素型別或 類別型別的指定成員。

span.span: Invokes the specified member of the element type or the class type.
The return value of the call to the member.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可以使用晚期繫結叫用陣列的項目類型上的成員。This method can use late binding to invoke the member on the element type of the array.
